game.title: Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve the legendary Scepter of Light from the Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess.
game.description: The village elder has requested your assistance in retrieving a powerful artifact. The scepter is hidden within the ancient temple, but beware of the deadly traps and puzzles that lie within.

tasks.objective: Navigate through the temple's entrance maze.
tasks.description: Find the hidden passage to enter the temple. Solve the pressure plate puzzle to unlock the door.

tasks.objective: Defeat the temple's boss, a powerful undead sorcerer.
tasks.description: Face off against the sorcerer in combat and use your wits to exploit his weaknesses. Use the environment to your advantage!

tasks.objective: Retrieve the Scepter of Light from its pedestal.
tasks.description: Solve the final puzzle to unlock the pedestal where the scepter rests. Use your knowledge of ancient lore to decipher the riddle.
